item.description:
Our guest speaker this month is Dale McGowan, editor and co-author of "Parenting Beyond Belief: On Raising Ethical, Caring Kids Without Religion," who will talk to us about secular parenting.

To accommodate the schedule of our guest speaker, we will be meeting on a Saturday afternoon. We'll start with coffee and conversation at 2:30 PM, and Dale's talk will follow brief announcements at 3:00 PM.

Mr. McGowan will present a seminar on parenting at USNH earlier in the day. There's a small cover charge for that seminar.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Monthly Meeting
